node.title: Blockchain Developers Meetup — #0x01 — Dark DAOs and On-chain vote buying
node.content:
Hey guys,

Yesterday we’ve conducted the first Blockchain Developers Meetup and it went very well.

The topic was “Dark DAOs and On-chain vote buying”, inspired by concerning news of possibilities for arising Dark Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). So we’ve made our research, and found very interesting posts and proposals about it.

We’d like to thank all researchers and scientists that are looking very deeply into the matter, because this would have not been possible without their hard work.

The presentation was very interesting and we’ve covered the main key issues about it:

  • What is a DAO?
  • How does a DAO work?
  • What is the difference between a DAO and a traditional top-down hierarchical company?
  • Vote buying issues in the traditional in-face voting
  • Voting on the blockchain — the issues it solves and the issues that occur using blockchain
  • Possible attacks and vulnerabilities of voting conducted on the blockchain.
  • Trusted hardware
  • What is a Dark DAO and how it can be used for vote buying, manipulation and fraud?

We’ve recorded the session, so it’s available for later watching and for others that could not made it to be on time.

Watch the session here:

Also, here are the slides: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EN4RIqARuUrhkpoNJVo5u9QZnHRCC3vN/view

We’ve received good feedback, so we are planning on holding the next meetup later this month.

If you are interested in talking on some cool topic, or you want to propose some topic to be discussed — just drop us a line at events@hack.bg or write down a comment / reply.

Thank you all for joining and hope to see you again next time!

node.title: We started the Blockchain Developers Meetup
node.content:
We are very inspired by the decentralization models, so we want to contribute however we can towards it. That’s why we organized a Blockchain Developers Meetup, so that we could involve and pass our knowledge to as much people as we can. Hopefully we inspire developers and enthusiasts to the new disruptive technology — blockchain. We love this topic and we believe it is here to stay, so we intend to make these meetups be “from developers to developers” and share knowledge in our community.

Sharing knowledge is what this meetup group is for. Blockchain technology is in its infancy, so every bit of new information is very valuable and is helping the community to grow.

Our meetup is being held monthly and is focused on the development practices and trends in the blockchain area. It is 100% non-profit oriented and motivated by our love for this topic, our passion for open source, knowledge sharing, constant learning, meeting new people and having fun.

You can visit our meetup page and be part of our community as well.

In this group we will be talking and discussing blockchains, smart contracts, on-chain and off-chain transactions, cryptography, consensus algorithms and implementations. The topics will be mostly development related, but whether you are a developer or don’t have any experience in this field — you are mostly welcome.

If you want to contribute to our meetup by speaking on some blockchain related topic or you have some other idea in mind — drop us a line at events@hack.bg
